title: Police: 7-Year-Old Fatally Shot by Brother in KY While Playing with Gun
content:
LAWRENCE COUNTY, KY -
The two boys were playing with a loaded gun when the 7-year-old was shot
The accident occurred just before 11 PM on July Drive in Lowmansville, KY which is in Lawrence County, Kentucky but near the Johnson County line.
According to the Kentucky State Police, this was just a tragic accident and do not anticipate filing charges against the parents.
The 7 year old was taken to Paul Hall hospital where he was pronounced dead.
We will continue to update this story as we get new information.
